players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice was found dead last night, so we need to be very careful today. I think we should listen closely to what Bob and Charlie say to spot any inconsistencies."

Charlie: "Alice was killed last night. This is a tragedy, but we must remain calm and logical. Diana, you mentioned listening to Bob and me. I agree we should all be heard. Let's focus on who might have done this. I have no information to share..."
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and found out he is lying about having no information."
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. We must vote to arrest him now before he kills again."
Diana: "Bob makes a strong accusation against Charlie, but he hasn’t explained how he investigated or what role he really has. Bob, can you clarify your role and investigation method?"

Charlie: "Bob, your accusation is bold, but your reasoning is weak. You claim to have investigated me, yet you reveal nothing about your own role or how you confirmed my supposed lie. This makes your claim highly suspect. I, on the other hand, have been transparent about..."
